title: Settings
manageCategoriesDesc: Manage subscription categories for better organization.
managePaymentMethodsDesc: Manage available payment methods for your subscriptions.
optionAddSuccess: New {{type}} option has been added successfully.
deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? Any subscriptions using this {{type}} will need to be updated.
chooseBetweenThemes: Choose between light, dark, or system preference
manageApiKeyDesc: Manage your API key for backend synchronization. This key is stored locally.
apiKeyRequired: The API key is required for creating, updating, or deleting subscriptions.
apiKeySavedDesc: Your new API key has been securely saved.
exportImportDesc: Export your subscriptions or import from another service
resetDataDesc: This will permanently delete all your subscriptions and settings. This action cannot be undone.
resetAllDataConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset all data? This will permanently delete all subscriptions, payment history, and settings. This action cannot be undone.
setPreferredCurrency: Set your preferred currency for expense calculation
preferredCurrencyDesc: Your preferred currency for displaying subscription costs
showOriginalCurrencyDesc: Always display the original subscription currency alongside converted values
automaticExchangeRateUpdates: Automatic exchange rate updates and current status
apiKeyNotConfigured: API key not configured. Automatic updates are disabled.
allRatesRelativeTo: All rates are relative to {{currency}} (1 {{currency}} = X currency)
uploadCsvOrJson: Upload a CSV or JSON file to import multiple subscriptions at once.
unsupportedFileFormat: Unsupported file format. Please upload a CSV or JSON file.
